theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature54.NAME: 5/4 Time Signature
theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature54.FLAVOR: Rumor has it that those who lose their 'Time Signature' will have to deal with 5/4 time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have more than #b5 #yBeat, lose #b5 #yBeats and gain #b1 #yMeasure.

theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature44.NAME: 4/4 Time Signature
theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature44.FLAVOR: Rumor has it that those who lose their 'Time Signature' will have to deal with 5/4 time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have more than #b4 #yBeat, lose #b4 #yBeats and gain #b1 #yMeasure.

theRhythmGirl:Cowbell.NAME: Cowbell
theRhythmGirl:Cowbell.FLAVOR: When you feel like you've lost the rhythm, you can always fall back on this cue to guide you.

theRhythmGirl:Widget.NAME: Widget
theRhythmGirl:Widget.FLAVOR: Word about the high quality of our widgets has gotten out, so we need more! Pick up the pace!

theRhythmGirl:Quicknibble.NAME: Quicknibble
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you gain a #yMeasure each turn, gain 1 [E] .

theRhythmGirl:Freepeat.NAME: Freepeat
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards created by the #yRepeat keyword cost #b0 that turn.

theRhythmGirl:GoForAPerfect.NAME: Go for a Perfect
theRhythmGirl:GoForAPerfect.FLAVOR: If you get a Perfect on 'Card Crawl Game' right now, you'll receive 35 gold!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, if you didn't lose any HP that combat, gain #y35 #ygold.
